models.title: Models to run
models.description: must match the name of folder under rnnlm/models and the key in the hyperparameters hash

predict_mode.title: Prediction mode
predict_mode.description: whether to use the model to predict (true) or train (false)

learning_technique.title: Learning technique
learning_technique.description: what learning technique to use to train the model

hyperparameters.title: Hyperparameters Schema
hyperparameters.description: Hyperparameters per model. Each key must match the model name in 'models' array and the folder under rnnlm/models

shared_params.title: The Shared_params Schema
shared_params.description: hyperparameters for the shared layer between tasks, if training one task, here you define the parameters for the hidden layer etc.

create_model.title: The Create_model Schema
create_model.description: The name of the model that will be used to create the hidden layers that are shared between all tasks.

data.title: The Data Schema
data.description: Contains paths and configurations for the data files

save_path.title: The Save_path Schema
save_path.description: Path where the results will be saved

tf_records_path.title: The Tf_records_path Schema
tf_records_path.description: path of the tfrecords folder relative to the data_path

summary_steps.title: The Summary_steps Schema
summary_steps.description: Steps interval for saving TensorBoard summarizes

keep_checkpoint_max.title: The Keep_checkpoint_max Schema
keep_checkpoint_max.description: how many files to keep for checkpoint hitory
